General.Name: Infimer Ltd
General.Description: Infimer Ltd develops technology and production processes for converting municipal solid waste. The company produces Infimer, a thermoplastic composite material that serves as an alternative to the raw materials used by the plastics industry, and minimizes cost of household landfilling and the carbon footprints. Its Infimer range of thermoplastic composite materials are used for the production of plastic products, such as garden sheds, chairs, pallets, toolboxes, and pipes. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Avihayil, Israel.
